kw.name: Get Device Id
kw.doc: Robot Framework keyword. Returns the device_id for the requested DUT (Phone / Main / Cluster).

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Run Command
kw.doc: Runs any shell/adb/system command and returns the output. Usage: Run Command adb devices

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Establish Adb Connection
kw.doc: Establish ADB connection using device_id from configuration. If already connected, return status.

kw.name: Click By Image
kw.doc: Takes screenshot using take_android_screenshot(), performs template match, clicks, and logs highlighted image on specific device. `dut_name`: DUT name as defined in configuration.ini

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Verify Image
kw.doc: Verifies full or partial image match AND logs both images in Robot report.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Swipe
kw.doc: Performs swipe on a specific DUT.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Tap By Coordinates
kw.doc: Tap on screen using X,Y coordinates from JSON key. JSON is auto-loaded from Resources/Coordinates/.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Tap By Text
kw.doc: Tap on visible text using OCR (Tesseract). Works on any screen without XML or UI dump.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Verify Text Ocr
kw.doc: Verifies COMPLETE text using OCR. Passes only if ALL words are present. Highlights all matched words in report.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Stop Screen Recording
kw.doc: Stop screenrecord and pull video.

kw.name: Get Absolute Path
kw.doc: Return absolute path of a file.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
